content.text: Match ends, Arsenal 3, Watford 0.
Second Half ends, Arsenal 3, Watford 0.
Granit Xhaka (Arsenal) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Troy Deeney (Watford).
Offside, Arsenal. Ainsley Maitland-Niles tries a through ball, but Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang is caught offside.
Danny Welbeck (Arsenal) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Adrian Mariappa (Watford).
Attempt missed. Sebastian Prödl (Watford) left footed shot from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Abdoulaye Doucouré with a headed pass following a set piece situation.
Granit Xhaka (Arsenal) is shown the yellow card.
Foul by Granit Xhaka (Arsenal).
Will Hughes (Watford) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Stefano Okaka (Watford) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Sead Kolasinac (Arsenal).
Attempt blocked. Richarlison (Watford) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Watford. Conceded by Ainsley Maitland-Niles.
Richarlison (Watford) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Granit Xhaka (Arsenal).
Corner,  Arsenal. Conceded by Orestis Karnezis.
Attempt saved. Danny Welbeck (Arsenal) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Jack Wilshere.
Offside, Arsenal. Jack Wilshere tries a through ball, but Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang is caught offside.
Substitution, Watford. Miguel Britos replaces Daryl Janmaat.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Granit Xhaka (Arsenal) because of an injury.
Will Hughes (Watford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mesut Özil (Arsenal).
Substitution, Arsenal. Jack Wilshere replaces Henrikh Mkhitaryan.
Goal!  Arsenal 3, Watford 0. Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Arsenal) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Substitution, Arsenal. Calum Chambers replaces Shkodran Mustafi because of an injury.
Delay in match Shkodran Mustafi (Arsenal) because of an injury.
Attempt missed. Daryl Janmaat (Watford) right footed shot from the right side of the box is close, but misses to the right.
Shkodran Mustafi (Arsenal) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Stefano Okaka (Watford).

Foul by Mohamed Elneny (Arsenal).

Substitution, Watford. Stefano Okaka replaces Roberto Pereyra.
Substitution, Arsenal. Danny Welbeck replaces Alex Iwobi.
José Holebas (Watford) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by José Holebas (Watford).
Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Arsenal) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Sead Kolasinac (Arsenal) header from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Mesut Özil with a cross following a corner.
Corner,  Arsenal. Conceded by Sebastian Prödl.
Substitution, Watford. Will Hughes replaces Kiko Femenía.
Penalty saved! Troy Deeney (Watford) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the centre of the goal.
Penalty conceded by Ainsley Maitland-Niles (Arsenal) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Watford. Roberto Pereyra draws a foul in the penalty area.
Goal!  Arsenal 2, Watford 0. Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Arsenal) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Henrikh Mkhitaryan with a through ball.
